data.description:
Aug-18-2017 update!

-New 6 songs released
-New game play added

Want to experience the feeling of your heart pulsing and your adrenaline soaring?

Then come and shake your head while you follow the pulse of the colorful notes!

-Developed by Unreal Engine 4 !
-World Ranking !
-Racing and rhythm games !
-Electronic music !

Instructions:
ElectroBeats is a combination of electronic style and the rhythm of the game, you will need to turn your head to control your direction. Strike the notes flying towards you and nod when the purple note approaches.

Tips: combo and nodding can get amazing high marks, don't hit the wall!

You might not feel comfortable controlling your direction by turning your head at first, but just imagine you are driving on the road, and you need to look at the desired direction first before you want to change lanes.

All songs in this game are provided by NCS (No Copyright Sound). You can visit NCS' YouTube Channel for more information.

changelog.change_log:
-Leaderboard bug （Fixed）
-Oculus Go & Controller（Input support）
-Some known issues （Fixed）

-Added new game play
 -Added new 6 songs!
 -Overall optimization
 
 If you are using Samsung S8 which carry with Enxyon 8895 as CPU, you may see some lag at first time, then it will be perfect smooth!

-Added new game play
-Added new 6 songs!
-Overall optimization

If you are using Samsung S8 which carry with Enxyon 8895 as CPU, you may see some lag at first time, then it will be perfect smooth!

Fixed: The beats doesn't match music on S8/S8+.
Fixed: The menu freeze at beginning.
Update: Graphics of the beats light.

Unfixed: Some of S8/S8+ users may got a short freeze（about 0.1~0.2s）at the first time when you start a song, but this issue only appear for just one time then it will be perfect smooth.

-Add GearVR controller supported.
-Fixed sensitivity issue.
-System Optimization.

-Add GearVR controller supported.
-Fixed sensitivity issue.
-System Optimization.
World rankings update, now you can use Oculus ID as a ranking name.

Optimize the dynamic effect of the propeller on both sides~
From 22 April to 2 May for a 66% discount !!!
Add the world total score ranking, the game will automatically add up your score for each song.

Change back butten function.
Add the user wifi permission : <uses-permissionandroid:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE"> in manifest.xml.
Fix user permission settings and keep game 60 fps.
